name: O Antagonista - Minimalist Dark
description: O Antagonista - Dark Theme, No Ads, No Share, With/Without Comments
css: @-moz-document domain("oantagonista.com"){#form-newsletter{display:none!important;margin:0}#auth,#boxpost article.post,#wrapper,#wrapper #auth .close-auth-button,#wrapper #auth .container-auth-screen,.auth-container-form,.connected_account_rows .switch_box,.containera,.entry-content .video-content,.hentry,.list-user-favs,.mn-auth a.back,.relatedBox,.widget-eleicoes-2018,.wp-caption-text,.youareonpage,article .nex-prev-links a,body .page .tags_list a,html{background-color:#232323}.widget-eleicoes-2018,body .catchment-box{margin:0}body.scrollpage .containera,body.scrollpage .containera-close{background:0 0}.list-user-favs h2,.user-logout{background-color:#424242;text-shadow:none}#supermenu .menu-form-busca,.slider,body .catchment-box{background-color:#616161}body .catchment-box .catch-email{padding:.375em;width:88%}body .catchment-box{text-align:left}.cancel-pass,.gen.active,.update-mail,.update-pass,.user-logged .user_data,header#header .search-user .auth-button .fletter,input:checked+.slider{background-color:#039be5}#auth,#boxpost .podcasts a,#boxpost article.post a h2,#boxpost article.post a.article_link,#boxpost article.post.sticky a h2,#form-register-ini,#wrapper #auth .close-auth-button,.cancel-pass,.connected_account h2,.connected_account_rows .social_name,.containera h2,.copy_link_end_post,.entry-content .video-content h2,.entry-header a,.entry-title,.gen,.gen.active,.list-user-favs h2,.list-user-favs ul li .del-fav,.list-user-favs ul li a span.date,.list-user-favs ul li a span.title,.mn-auth a.back,.msg h2,.page .relatedBox h3,.page p,.relatedBox ul li a,.update-mail,.update-pass,.user-logged .user_data .user-name,.user-logout,.video-roll article a.video-link,.wp-caption-text,.wp-embed,.wp-embed a,.wp-embed-heading a,article .nex-prev-links a,article.post span.postmeta,body,body .form-newsletter p,body .page .form-newsletter h2,body .page .tags_list a,body .page article.post a.fav,body .page article.post a.fav small,body.single article.post p,button,header#header #form-search .input,header#header .search-user a,html,select,strong{color:#f5f5f5}.containera.removedisplay .containera-detach svg,body.scrollpage .containera-close span svg{fill:#f5f5f5}.containera.removedisplay .containera-detach svg:hover,body.scrollpage .containera-close span svg:hover{fill:#039be5}#boxpost article.post a h2:hover,.cadastrese,.comment-content a,.container-widget-eleicoes-2018 h2,.entry-content a,.entry-summary a,.facalogin,.page-content a,.pingback .comment-body>a,.relatedBox ul li a:active,.relatedBox ul li a:focus,.relatedBox ul li a:hover,a,a:hover,article .nex-prev-links a:hover,header#header #supermenu ul li a:hover,header#header #supermenu ul li h3,header#header .search-user a:active,header#header .search-user a:hover{color:#039be5}.entry-content .video-content h2 span{background:#f5f5f5;color:#616161}article .nex-prev-links a,article .relatedBox ul li a{border:2px solid #9e9e9e}article .nex-prev-links a:hover,article .relatedBox ul li a:hover{border:2px solid #039be5}.container-widget-eleicoes-2018{border:1px solid #616161}table{border:3px solid #9e9e9e!important}td{border:1px solid #9e9e9e!important}#boxpost article.post{width:auto}#boxpost article.post{border:1px solid #616161}.youareonpage{border-bottom:none}.col-md-8{width:100%;max-width:100%}#boxpost .podcasts,body.scrollpage .widget-eleicoes-2018{background-color:#424242}#boxpost .podcasts.active{background-color:#616161}body.scrollpage .close-election{border:none}::-moz-placeholder,input,input:focus,label.title,textarea,textarea:focus{color:#f5f5f5}::-webkit-input-placeholder,input,input:focus,label.title,textarea,textarea:focus{color:#f5f5f5}::-moz-placeholder,input,textarea,textarea:focus{font-family:arial}::-webkit-input-placeholder,input,textarea,textarea:focus{font-family:arial}.gen,input[type=text]{background-color:#424242;border:1px solid #616161}body .catchment-box .catch-email{background-color:#424242;border:none;box-shadow:none}input[type=text]:focus{background-color:#616161}#wrapper #auth .login-popin-overlay{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.75)}.fake-input{background-color:#9e9e9e;border:1px solid #616161;text-shadow:none;color:#212121}.msg .ressend-email,body .catchment-box .catch-submit{background-color:#01579b;border-bottom:none}.msg .ressend-email:hover,body .catchment-box .catch-submit:hover{background-color:#0277bd;border-bottom:none}body .catchment-box .catch-submit{box-shadow:-5px 0 0 #616161}.list-user-favs ul li:nth-child(odd){background-color:#616161;border-top:1px solid #616161;border-bottom:1px solid #616161}.list-user-favs ul li:nth-child(even){background-color:#424242;border-top:1px solid #424242;border-bottom:1px solid #424242}.list-user-favs ul li:hover{background-color:#757575!important;border-top:1px solid #757575;border-bottom:1px solid #757575}/*[[comments]]*//*[[ads]]*//*[[share]]*//*[[tv]]*/}@-moz-document url("https://www.oantagonista.com/assine-nossa-newsletter/"){#form-newsletter{display:block!important;background-color:#424242;border:1px solid #424242;margin:10px 20px 50px 20px}body .form-newsletter form .input-email{background-color:#616161;box-shadow:none}body .form-newsletter form .bt-submit{background-color:#01579b;color:#f5f5f5;border:1px solid #01579b}body .form-newsletter form .bt-submit:hover{background-color:#0277bd;color:#f5f5f5;border:1px solid #0277bd}}@-moz-document url-prefix("https://www.oantagonista.com/eleicoes-2018/"){.bbb-bottom,hr{display:none!important;height:0!important;width:0!important}.accordion__title,.header,.list-group-item:first-child,.list-group-item:first-child:hover,.select-tab-list,.selects-header{background:#232323!important}#selecione-estado{background:#616161!important}.form-control,.header,.lista-candidatos .candidato-titulo small,span{color:#f5f5f5!important}.rodape .row div span:first-child,h1.entry-title{color:#039be5!important}.spinner{background-color:#039be5}.custom-select{background:url(https://cdn.oantagonista.com/uploads/assets/eleicoes-2018/images/arrow-down.png) right 7px center/16px no-repeat #616161!important;border-bottom:1px solid #616161!important;border:1px solid #616161!important;box-shadow:inset 1px 0 5px #616161}.col-8,.rodape .col-7{max-width:50%}.rodape-topo .col-nulos{flex:none}.btn-primary{background-color:#01579b;color:#f5f5f5;border:1px solid #01579b;font-family:Arial}.btn-primary:hover{background-color:#0277bd;color:#f5f5f5;border:1px solid #0277bd}#selecione-estado label,.form-control{font-family:Arial}.col .float-left{max-width:30%}}

style_setting_options.label: With Comments
style_setting_options.value: .advise-term, .auth-container-form h2, .comment-author, .comment-list .reply a, .comment-metadata a, .comments-area #submit-a, .input, .oferta-login .chamada, .oferta-login .user-icon, .page p.comment-optin label, .question span, .submit.disable { color: #f5f5f5 } .comments-area #submit-a:hover { background-color: #232323 } .oferta-login a{ background: #424242; } .advise-term, .input, .oferta-login, .page p.comment-optin, .question span, input[type=email], input[type=password], input[type=search], input[type=text], input[type=url], textarea { background-color: #424242; border: 1px solid #616161 } input[type=email]:focus, input[type=password]:focus, input[type=search]:focus, input[type=text]:focus, input[type=url]:focus, textarea:focus { background-color: #616161 } .submit.disable { background-color: #757575; border-bottom: none; text-shadow: none } .submit.disable:hover { background-color: #424242; border-bottom: none } #read-comments, .submit{ background-color: #01579b; border-bottom: none } #read-comments:hover, .submit:hover{ background-color: #0277bd; border-bottom: none } .cadastrese, .comment-list .reply a:hover, .comment-metadata a:hover, .comments-area #submit-a:hover, .facalogin, .regular-checkbox + label { color: #039be5 } .advise-term, .input { border: 1px solid #616161 } #social-buttons.disable .block-resource { background-color: rgba(35, 35, 35, .5) } .comments-area { border-top: 0 }

style_setting_options.label: With Share
style_setting_options.value: #share-box .box-close .close-share-box,#share-box .box-close h2,#share-box .box-news-share h3,body .page article.post a.share-alt,body .page article.post a.share-alt small{color:#f5f5f5}#share-box .box-close .close-share-box{background:#232323;color:#f5f5f5;width:60px;height:20px;position:absolute;border-radius:3px;font-size:1rem;line-height:2rem;top:10px;right:10px;text-transform:uppercase}.glyphicon-remove-circle::before{content:"Fechar";font-family:arial}body .page article.post a.share-alt .share-alt-icon{background-image:url(https://i.imgur.com/1Wiq6cz.png)}.single .entry-header span.share hr{background:#f5f5f5}.single .entry-header .share a{background:#232323}#share-box .box-news-share h3{position:relative;float:left;top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,50%)}#share-box{background:#232323;border:none;border-radius:0;left:0;right:0;top:0;bottom:0;margin:auto;box-shadow:0 0 50px #000}#share-box-overlay{background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.75)}.single .entry-header span.share{line-height:normal}.single .entry-header .share a{padding:0 8px 0 8px}.single .entry-header .share a.fb,.single .entry-header .share a.gm,.single .entry-header .share a.tw{color:#a9a9a9}.single .entry-header .share a.fb:hover{color:#3b5999}#share-box .box-news-share ul li.fb span.ico,#share-box .box-news-share ul li.fb span.share-link{background-color:#3b5999}.single .entry-header .share a.tw:hover{color:#55acee}.single .entry-header .share a.gm:hover{color:#dd4b39}#share-box .box-news-share ul li.gm span.ico,#share-box .box-news-share ul li.gm span.share-link{background-color:#dd4b39}.box-news-share ul li span.space:before{font-family:freight-display-pro,serif}.box-news-share ul li.fb span.space:before{content:"Facebook";margin:0 10px}.box-news-share ul li.tw span.space:before{content:"Twitter";margin:0 10px}.box-news-share ul li.lk span.space:before{content:"LinkedIn";margin:0 10px}.box-news-share ul li.gm span.space:before{content:"Google+";margin:0 10px}.box-news-share ul li.email span.space:before{content:"Email";margin:0 10px}#share-box .box-close{background:#039be5}#share-box .box-news-share ul li.fb span.ico,#share-box .box-news-share ul li.fb span.share-link{fill:#f5f5f5}#share-box .box-news-share ul li .link-to-share{background-color:#424242!important;border:1px solid #616161;color:#f5f5f5}#share-box .box-news-share ul li .link-to-share:focus{background-color:#616161!important}#share-box .box-news-share ul li.link span.ico,#share-box .box-news-share ul li.link span.share-link{background-color:#01579b!important}#share-box .box-news-share ul li.email span.ico,#share-box .box-news-share ul li.email span.share-link{background-color:#0277bd}
